name: zk-lib
title: ZwerOxotnik's extendable library [WIP]
author: ZwerOxotnik
description:
I'll add a universal command widget in the next major update

Provides, combines, packages libraries, utilities for (new) mods and to the game as tools/features (UI isn't ready yet).

Also, supports auto-generated mods and has modified event listener and I consider about to provide other extra light files/things for mods.
